sys_ux_client_script.name: Task Approve/Reject

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_f49513e448607110613897ce41221112
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Tasks">7c9513e4c1607110c653df9709670d12</macroponent><name>Task Approve/Reject</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const approveOrReject = event.elementId;
    if (approveOrReject == 'button_2') {
        const approveFileds =
            `state=approved`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.context.props.approvalId,
            'templateFields': approveFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
    } else if (approveOrReject == 'button_1') {
        const rejectedFileds =
            `state=rejected`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.context.props.approvalId,
            'templateFields': rejectedFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-06 09:38:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>f49513e448607110613897ce41221112</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Task Approve/Reject</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KS Investment Requests" source="x_557984_ks_inve_0">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="KS Investment Requests">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_f49513e448607110613897ce41221112</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-06 09:38:02</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
